name: .HME File Extension
summary: Learn about .HME files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Theme file used by Windows Mobile devices; contains home screen graphics and other theme settings such as the color scheme; used to modify the look and feel of the mobile device's user interface.

content: Themes can be installed by opening HME files directly on the Windows Mobile device.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
